import axios from "axios"; import React from "react"; export default function ThirdPage(props) { const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(props.appointmentData); try { const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:5050/auth/appointmentForm', props.appointmentData); if (response.status === 200) { const data = response.data; console.log('Booking successful:', data); props.setCurrentPage('success') setTimeout(() => { props.setLoading(true) }, 2000); } else { console.error('bookign failed:', response.data.message); // Handle the login failure, show a message to the user, etc. } } catch (error) { console.error('Error during login:', error.message); // Handle unexpected errors, show a message to the user, etc. } }; return (

); }
